recoverWalletWithoutProfileStart_header_: If you have no wallet backup in the cloud or as an exported backup file, you still have other restore options.
recoverWalletWithoutProfileStart_section: **I only want to restore Ledger hardware wallet Accounts**
**I only have Accounts created on the Radix Olympia Network**
recoverWalletWithoutProfileStart_useNewW: Tap “I'm a New Wallet User”. After completing wallet creation, you can recover any Olympia or Ledger-based Accounts in Settings.
